name: Counterclaim; retention of jurisdiction
text: When the limit of the district court as provided by section 633-27 is exceeded in a counterclaim but within the jurisdictional limit of the court as provided by section 604-5, the action shall nevertheless remain in the small claims division of the district court and be tried therein in its entirety. [L 1970, c 182, pt of §1; am L 1971, c 144, §24]
